Room.Name: Hofton Avenue
Room.ShortDescription: You are walking down Hofton Avenue, in the northeastern section of town.
Room.LongDescription: Despite the heavy military presence in the area, the northeastern quadrant of town tends to be the rowdiest of them all. Numerous nightclubs and bars line the streets, filled with officers and enlisted men after a long day at work. They tend not to be in very good moods. You might think twice before entering any bar on this side of the town.
